name: Earth.gov
description: Public-facing interagency data portal for high-level actionable datasets.

name: Firefly
description: Firefly is a cutting-edge 3D browser-based, interactive, data visualization software designed for tens of millions of datapoints.

name: Eclipse Explorer
description: The 2023 Eclipse Explorer is an interactive web map that allows users to track the annular solar eclipse that occurred on 10/14/2023 over the United States.

name: Climate Legacies
description: Interactive visualization of the generational divide in climate impacts.

name: WIND
description: WIND is a CUDA library I built to numerically integrate stiff systems of coupled ODEs-- in particular interstellar chemical abundance networks.

name: Firefly Gaia DR3
description: Designed a massively parallel algorithm and progressive rendering scheme to visualize all 1.5 billion+ stars observed by the Gaia satellite.

name: FIRE Studio
description: A visualization package I created to streamline the process of producing publication-quality images of galaxy formation simulation data.

name: Supernova Clustering
description: Built a statistical model to understand and simplify the results of our supercomputer simulation and apply them in other contexts at less (computational) cost.

name: Stellar Feedback
description: Everyone knows about the sun, fewer people know where it came from and how other stars might've influenced its formation.

name: Mentorship Network
description: Designed and implemented a framework using network graph theory for optimizing mentor-mentee assignments into a complex hierarchical social network.
